#summary key()

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Returns the value of the primary key for this object. If you have a single primary named 

This is determined through database introspection. If composite primary keys have been used they will both be returned in a list.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset theKeyName = model("employee").primaryKey()>
}}}
